freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Audio.Manager

Description

Unknown

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Audio.Manager

Methods

  • SetVolume
  • SetVolumePreference
  • Mute
  • Unmute
  • SetMode
  • GetCurrentMode
  • SetOutput
  • SetInput
  • GetCurrentOutput
  • GetCurrentInput
  • GetAvailableOutputs
  • GetAvailableInputs

Signals

None

Errors

  • NotSupported

Methods

SetVolume ( y )

Parameters

y: volume

The volume in percent (0-100).

SetVolumePreference ( ii )

Parameters

i: min

Minimum raw audio volume level for this control.

i: max

Maximum raw audio volume level for this control.

Mute ( )

Description: Mute this control.

Unmute ( )

Description: Unmute this control.

SetMode ( s )

Description: Set the current audio mode. Currently there is only a difference between normal and call. Normal means all audio use when not in a phone call and call means all audio within a phone call.

Parameters

s: mode

GetCurrentMode ( ) → s

Description: Get the current audio mode which is used.

Returns

s: mode

SetOutput ( s )

Description: Set the current audio output which is used only within the current mode. If you switch mode then the manager will switch even the output to the last used one in the other mode.

Parameters

s: name

SetInput ( s )

Description: Set the current audio input which is used only within the current mode. If you switch mode then the manager will switch even the input to the last used one in the other mode.

Parameters

s: name

GetCurrentOutput ( ) → o

Description: Get the current audio output which is used.

Returns

o: path

GetCurrentInput ( ) → o

Description: Get the current audio input which is used.

Returns

o: path

GetAvailableOutputs ( s ) → as

Description: Get all available audio outputs for the specified audio mode.

Parameters

s: mode

Returns

as: outputs

GetAvailableInputs ( s ) → as

Description: Get all available audio inputs for the specified audio mode.

Parameters

s: mode

Returns

as: inputs

Errors

NotSupported
